content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Mining and Smelting Complex at position(-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61)
- Stone furnace at (-27, -59) with coal fuel and copper ore processing
- Burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5) 
- Wooden chest at (-26.5, -57.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at position(1, -60)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (1, -60)
- Wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5) containing iron ore
- Stone furnace at (2, -56) with coal fuel
- Burner inserter at (1.5, -57.5)

### Smelting Array at position(1, 1)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at (1, 1) with coal fuel
- Stone furnace at (3, 1) with coal fuel
- Wooden chests at (1.5, 3.5), (3.5, 3.5), (5.5, 3.5)
- Burner inserters at (1.5, 2.5), (3.5, 2.5), (5.5, 2.5)

### Production Line at position(2, 7)
Consists of:
- Stone furnaces at (2, 7) and (4, 7) with coal fuel
- Wooden chests at (2.5, 9.5) and (4.5, 9.5)
- Burner inserters at (2.5, 8.5), (4.5, 8.5), (3.5, 9.5)

### Copper Cable Assembly Line at position(14.5, 14.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (14.5, 14.5)
- Wooden chest at (14.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at (14.5, 12.5)
- Wooden chest at (11.5, 14.5) containing copper cable
- Burner inserter at (12.5, 14.5)

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line at position(21.5, 15.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (21.5, 15.5)
- Wooden chest at (24.5, 15.5) containing electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at (23.5, 15.5)
- Wooden chest at (21.5, 11.5) containing iron plates and copper cable
- Burner inserter at (21.5, 13.5)

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (2.5, 36.5)
- Boiler at (37.5, 19.0)
- Steam engine at (43.5, 19.5)

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors with water connections
- Ensure there is a clear path between entities that need to be connected with water pipes
- Check if connection points between entities are properly aligned and not blocked

### Errors when placing entities
- Verify the target location is clear of other entities before placing new ones
- Consider the entity dimensions when choosing placement locations
- Check if there is enough space around the target location for the entity's full footprint

### Power distribution issues
- Multiple entities showing "not receiving electricity" warnings
- Ensure proper connection of electrical poles to create a complete power network
- Check if power generation system is properly set up and connected to the electrical network
